Item ID1265

A bronze pickaxe is a pickaxe made of bronze. It is given to players during the Mining part of Tutorial Island when players first start out. It is the lowest-grade pickaxe.

Bronze pickaxes spawn in several locations in Misthalin and Asgarnia, and they can also be bought from various shops.
